languages.text: The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.
languages.original_text: Первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит целям дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный значению {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}разрушения{/g}, и столько же {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору.

traits.locale_text: The first use of an attacking Navigator's power does not start the cooldown of the attacking Navigator's powers. The second use of a Navigator's power will deal an additional damage equal to the devastating parameter to all targets, and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

The first use of a damaging Navigator power does not start the cooldown of this power. The second use of a damaging Navigator power will deal additional damage equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

The first use of a damaging Navigator power does not start the cooldown of this power. The second use of a damaging Navigator power will deal additional damage equal to the devastating parameter to all targets and the same amount of direct damage to the Navigator.

The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.

languages.text: Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe des {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g}-Parameters und dem Navigator denselben Schaden als {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Höhe des {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g}-Parameters und dem Navigator denselben Schaden als {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du navigateur au cours du même tour inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal à la valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} à toutes les cibles et le même nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au navigateur.
languages.original_text: The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: À chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du Navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du Navigateur au cours du même tour inflige un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires égal à la valeur du paramètre {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} à toutes les cibles et le même nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au Navigateur.

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}属性值。此外，导航者本人也会承受同等{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: 首次使用伤害性的导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。第二次使用伤害性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成伤害，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}属性值。此外，导航者本人也会承受同等直击伤害。

每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}属性值。此外，导航者本人也会承受同等{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。

languages.text: El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional igual al parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastación{/g} a todos los objetivos y otro tanto de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante.
languages.original_text: The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional igual al parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastación{/g} a todos los objetivos y otro tanto de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、すべてのターゲットに対し{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}壊滅{/g}パラメーターと同等の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をすべてのターゲットに与え、および航宙士に対して同等の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、すべてのターゲットに対し{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}壊滅{/g}パラメーターと同等の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をすべてのターゲットに与え、および航宙士に対して同等の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。

ターン毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}壊滅{/g}パラメーターと同等の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}をすべてのターゲットに与え、および航宙士に対して同等の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит целям дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, равный значению {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}разрушения{/g}, и столько же {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору.
languages.original_text: The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.

traits.locale_text: После первого использования психосилы навигатора, наносящей урон, не требуется {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}время восстановления{/g}. Второе применение атакующей психосилы навигатора наносит дополнительный урон, равный значению {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}разрушения{/g}, всем целям и столько же прямого урона самому навигатору.

После первого использования психосилы навигатора, наносящей урон, не требуется {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}время восстановления{/g}. Второе применение атакующей психосилы навигатора наносит дополнительный урон, равный значению {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}разрушения{/g}, всем целям и столько же прямого урона самому навигатору.

languages.text: Saldırı amaçlı bir Rotacı gücünün bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turdaki{/g} ilk kullanımı, gücü {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresine{/g} sokmaz ve tur başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz. Aynı turda bu gücün ikinci kez veya saldırı amaçlı başka bir Rotacı gücünün kullanımı, tüm hedeflere {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}yıkıcı{/g} parametresi kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirken Rotacı da yine aynı miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: The first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} parameter to all targets and the same amount of {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator.
